title: Weird Tales v11n01 [1928-01] (-ifc, ibc) (sas)
description: Note: The scan is missing the inside front cover and inside back cover of this issue. CONTENTS: Weird Tales [v11 #1, January 1928] (25¢, 144pp+, pulp, cover by C. C.
